articles.title: Mahakumbh: Ash-smeared holy men lead India bathing spectacle - BBC.com
articles.description: Millions are taking a dip in the sacred Ganges river on the first major bathing day of Kumbh Mela festival.
articles.content:
The bathing rituals are a key part of the 45-day long festival
Ash-smeared naked Hindu holy men charged into India's most sacred river Ganges at dawn on the first most significant bathing day of the… [+6445 chars]
